CustomField.description: Please inform the end customer that their credit card statement will show "PB*XXXXXX, PORTO ALEGRE" (XXXXXX will be replaced with your store's name). The soft descriptor is crucial to avoid chargebacks since most occur because the cardholder needs to identify the store's name or the city where we are located.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please inform the end customer that their credit card statement will show "PB*XXXXXX, PORTO ALEGRE" (XXXXXX will be replaced with your store's name). The soft descriptor is crucial to avoid chargebacks since most occur because the cardholder needs to identify the store's name or the city where we are located.
CustomField.label: Default Soft Descriptor
